name: Dear Mom
description:
"...there are things I couldn't say, but there's so much I wish you had known. There are things I never meant but said, being rude, speaking in arrogant tone. But, time made me realize that black and white isn't always wise, and that sometimes, things can be grey..."

'Dear Mom' is a short narrative-adventure game, an emotional narrative about a child’s feelings written to her mom, a letter which, always, will remain unread.

Key Feature: -
  • A poetic narration of a letter, written to mom.
  • Focuses more on experience rather than actions and puzzles.
  • A 15-30 minutes immersive emotional experience.
  • An unforgettable lifetime experience.
